screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .cptl file in Adobe Captivate 2019
screenshot.caption: CPTL file open in Adobe Captivate 2019

description: Captivate is utilized to create learning management system (LMS) products, such as quizzes, software demonstrations, and simulations. The software provides the CPTL template format for creating eLearning products that have the same style and structure. Captivate comes packaged with CPTL templates but also allows users to create custom templates.
To create a CPTL template, select File → New Project → Project Template... . When you save the template by selecting File → Save , Captivate creates the CPTL file to store the template data.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .cptl file in Adobe Captivate 2019
images.caption: CPTL file open in Adobe Captivate 2019
